name: Assignment1_Emergency
description:
Collecting the missing body parts to escape from the hospital. Blood kits are the bonus to increase the player's HP to go through the maze. 

  • The development process overall

The sprite sheet was the first stage of the development process.  What could be the best way to trigger the player to have the intention to collect the missing items. Tearing down the human body in pieces to let the player find each part then putting them back is the goal of this game. Mint blue wall has a vibe of the hospital, and the red background giving people a thrilling feeling. The soundtrack is also an add-on for the atmosphere. 

  • Successes
  1. Sprite sheet graphic design
  2. Collecting sound
  3. Soundtrack picking
  • Failures 
  1. The soundtrack can't loop in the background
  2. Score counting 
  3. Resolution for the graphic
  • Lessons Learned
  1. Screen size is tricky then I should set up a proper screen size before start
  2. Figure out how to do the score counting
  • Future Development
  1. More add-on elements to have more fun
  2. Add the further level to increase the game difficulty
